11426Science in China Series B: ChemistrySci. China Ser. B-Chem.1006-92911862-2771SP Science China PressHeidelbergs11426-009-0237-223710.1007/s11426-009-0237-2ArticleSynthesis, structure and physical properties of the one-dimensional chain complex of tetrathiafulvalene carboxylateChenYa1LiChengHui1WangCaiFeng1WuDi2ZuoJingLin1eYouXiaoZeng1fgrid.41156.37000000012314964XState Key Laboratory of Coordination Chemistry, School of Chemistry and Chemical Engineering, Nanjing National Laboratory of MicrostructuresNanjing University210093NanjingChinagrid.41156.37000000012314964XSolid State Microstructure Laboratory, Department of PhysicsNanjing University210093NanjingChinazuojl@nju.edu.cnyouxz@nju.edu.cn181020091020095210A Special Issue to Celebrate the 60th National Day of China159616011610200955200927200918102009© Science in China Press and Springer Berlin Heidelberg 20092009Abstract

A new Co(II) coordination polymer bearing TTF carboxylate group, [{Co2(trioTTF)2(H2O)6}·5H2O]n (1) (trioTTF = 2-(5,6,8,9,11,12,14,15-octahydro-[1,3]dithiolo[4,5-h][1,4,13,7,10]trioxadithiacyclopentadecin-2-ylidene)-1,3-dithiole-4,5-dicarboxylate), has been prepared and characterized. In the structure of 1, shorter intermolecular S····S contacts (3.565 Å) are found between the trioTTF groups from neighboring chains. The electric conductivity of 1 is poor due to the bulky crown-ether group, but it exhibits ferromagnetic interaction at low temperature.

elements.content: A new Co(II) coordination polymer bearing TTF carboxylate group, [{Co2(trioTTF)2(H2O)6}·5H2O]n (1) (trioTTF = 2-(5,6,8,9,11,12,14,15-octahydro-[1,3]dithiolo[4,5-h][1,4,13,7,10]trioxadithiacyclopentadecin-2-ylidene)-1,3-dithiole-4,5-dicarboxylate), has been prepared and characterized. In the structure of 1, shorter intermolecular S····S contacts (3.565 Å) are found between the trioTTF groups from neighboring chains. The electric conductivity of 1 is poor due to the bulky crown-ether group, but it exhibits ferromagnetic interaction at low temperature.
elements.clean_text:
Abstract

A new Co(II) coordination polymer bearing TTF carboxylate group, [{Co2(trioTTF)2(H2O)6}⋅5H2O]n (1) (trioTTF = 2-(5,6,8,9,11,12,14,15-octahydro-[1,3]dithiolo[4,5-h][1,4,13,7,10]trioxadithiacyclopentadecin-2-ylidene)-1,3-dithiole-4,5-dicarboxylate), has been prepared and characterized. In the structure of 1, shorter intermolecular S⋅⋅⋅⋅S contacts (3.565 Å) are found between the trioTTF groups from neighboring chains. The electric conductivity of 1 is poor due to the bulky crown-ether group, but it exhibits ferromagnetic interaction at low temperature.
